dataset_name: AI Inbox Analyzer - Synthetic Emails v1

emails.subject: Quick confirmation needed for the shipment slot
emails.snippet: Can you confirm we can keep the 10:00–12:00 slot tomorrow? The carrier needs it today.
emails.body_text:
Hi Polina,

Can you confirm we can keep the 10:00–12:00 slot tomorrow? The carrier needs a confirmation today to lock it in.

Thanks,
Anna

emails.subject: Invoice #CS-18420 due on 14 Dec
emails.snippet: Your invoice is due tomorrow. Payment is required to avoid service interruption.
emails.body_text:
Hello,

Invoice #CS-18420 is due on 14 Dec 2025.
Amount: €119.00

Payment is required to avoid service interruption.

Regards,
CloudService Billing

emails.subject: Action required: new device sign-in
emails.snippet: We noticed a sign-in attempt from a new device. Confirm within 24 hours.
emails.body_text:
Dear customer,

We noticed a sign-in attempt from a new device.
If this was you, please confirm within 24 hours.
If not, secure your account immediately.

— MyBank Security

emails.subject: Offer details — please confirm by Monday
emails.snippet: Please confirm acceptance by Monday so we can proceed with onboarding paperwork.
emails.body_text:
Hi Polina,

Sharing the offer details attached. Please confirm acceptance by Monday so we can proceed with onboarding paperwork.

Best,
Marta

emails.subject: Do you prefer option A or B for the landing page layout?
emails.snippet: I can implement either layout — need your pick and any notes on copy.
emails.body_text:
Hey,

I can implement either layout — option A (hero + pricing) or option B (case studies first). Which do you prefer? Any notes on the copy tone?

Thanks,
Dmitry

emails.subject: Your itinerary — please review passenger details
emails.snippet: Please check the spelling of passenger names. Corrections after today may incur fees.
emails.body_text:
Hello,

Your itinerary is attached. Please check the spelling of passenger names.
Corrections after today may incur fees.

Regards,
Airline Support

emails.subject: Can you share your feedback on the draft by end of week?
emails.snippet: We're collecting feedback on the draft. Your notes would help us finalize.
emails.body_text:
Hi,

We're collecting feedback on the draft. Your notes would help us finalize.
Can you share your feedback by end of week?

Thanks!

emails.subject: Payment failed — update your card to keep access
emails.snippet: Your latest payment failed. Update your card details to avoid losing access.
emails.body_text:
Hi,

Your latest payment failed.
Update your card details to keep your subscription active.

— Subscription Team

emails.subject: Draft contract attached — please review
emails.snippet: Attached is the draft contract. Please review and send comments when ready.
emails.body_text:
Hello,

Attached is the draft contract. Please review and send comments when ready.

Best,
Legal Team

emails.subject: Receipt for your payment
emails.snippet: Thanks — here is the receipt for your recent payment.
emails.body_text:
Hi,

Thanks — here is the receipt for your recent payment.

Regards,
Accounting

emails.subject: This week's updates: new features and tips
emails.snippet: Here are the latest product updates and tips to get more value.
emails.body_text:
Hi there,

Here are this week's updates:
- New dashboard widgets
- Faster exports
- Tips & tricks

See you next week!

emails.subject: Can you send me the photos when you have a minute?
emails.snippet: No rush — but I'd love the photos from last weekend.
emails.body_text:
Hey!

No rush — but I'd love the photos from last weekend when you have a minute.

❤️

emails.subject: Your package is out for delivery
emails.snippet: Your package is out for delivery and should arrive today.
emails.body_text:
Hello,

Your package is out for delivery and should arrive today.
Tracking: TRK-49210

— Delivery Updates

emails.subject: Re: Meeting notes
emails.snippet: Can you double-check the numbers in section 2? I'm not sure they're correct.
emails.body_text:
Hi Polina,

Can you double-check the numbers in section 2? I'm not sure they're correct.

Thanks,
Olga

emails.subject: We need additional info to close your ticket
emails.snippet: Please reply with your address confirmation so we can close the ticket.
emails.body_text:
Hello,

To close your ticket, please reply confirming your installation address.

Thanks,
Support

emails.subject: Password expires soon
emails.snippet: Your password will expire in 2 days. Update it to avoid losing access.
emails.body_text:

emails.subject: Your ticket confirmation
emails.snippet: Thanks for registering — your ticket is confirmed.
emails.body_text:
Hi,

Thanks for registering. Your ticket is confirmed.

— Event Team

emails.subject: Re: Proposal — small clarification
emails.snippet: Could you clarify whether the price includes implementation support?
emails.body_text:
Hi Polina,

Could you clarify whether the price includes implementation support? A quick yes/no is enough.

Thanks,
Mark

emails.subject: Tax form: please sign and return
emails.snippet: Please sign the attached form and return it. We need it to process this month's payroll.
emails.body_text:
Hi,

Please sign the attached tax form and return it.
We need it to process this month's payroll.

Thanks,

emails.subject: Scheduled maintenance tonight
emails.snippet: There will be maintenance tonight. No action needed unless you experience issues tomorrow.
emails.body_text:
Hello,

There will be scheduled maintenance tonight (23:00–01:00).
No action is required unless you experience issues tomorrow.

— Service Desk
